text: Yemwe abemeye! Mwategetswe guhorera abishwe; uwigenga agahorerwa uwigenga, umucakara agahorerwa umucakara n’umuntu w’igitsina gore agahorerwa undi w’igitsina gore. Ariko uwagira icyo ababarirwaho n’umuvandimwe we, (uwiciwe) azayikurikirane mu buryo bwiza, kandi (uwishe) na we azayitange ku neza. Uko ni ukoroherezwa n’impuhwe biturutse kwa Nyagasani wanyu. Uzarengera nyuma y’ibyo (agahora nyuma yo gutanga imbabazi no kwakira impozamarira), azahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
